Question: This person is generally referred to as a "reluctant" American Hero.
Hints: Flags were flown at half-staff on the day of this person's funeral.
While making a low bombing run at about 350 mph (560 km/h), this person's F9F Panther was hit by anti-aircraft fire.
This person's second and last spaceflight was as mission commander of the Apollo 11 moon landing, in July 1969.
